message: "There are bad people out there, and if we don't do our jobs as parents, our kids are going to be manipulated," said Wichita Police Sgt. Jeff Swanson. He gave a presentation at Wilbur Middle School, focusing on key ways parents and guardians can monitor online activity. Wichita Police Department

data.description: If you have children, they likely have a cell phone. That phone connects many of them to social media, a concern for many parents.
data.title: Police issue warning for kids using social media
